name: The Elder Trolls 2
description:
Are you ready for your heart to be turned into a stone cold icecube of death and all happiness to be purged from you forever ?

The Elder Trolls II is a remake/sequel of the badly-made but surprisingly-well received TET. Try, (and fail) to make it past 3 (soon to be 6) rage-inducing levels!

This game contains a lot of trolls. Disappearing and invisible blocks, unpredictable and bizarre AI, cats shooting fireballs, a very weird storyline, terrible art (i tried ok) and a troll music track and other sound effects.

This game isn't even remotely fair and will (hopefully) induce a lot of rage. That's intentional.

This game was a 2-week-challenge project and so likely has numerous bugs. If you notice one, please contact me or leave a comment!

Controls  | Description
------------- | -------------
WASD  | Move
ESC | Main Menu
Space/Click | Skip text
